column16: Deeper pond; some degradation, probably some stabilization since 2012
Average of all 2011-12 cores included in analysis. All cores obtained in June or July, so thicknesses of TL and IL are not precise.
Average of all 2019 cores included in analysis. Depths to massive ice increased significantly since 2011-12
